CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Permit Imprint"), "Permit Imprint, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Live / Pre-Cancelled Stamps"), "Live / Pre-Cancelled Stamps, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Standard Mail"), "Standard Mail, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Nonprofit Standard Mail"), "Nonprofit Standard Mail, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"First Class Mail"), "First Class Mail, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Bound Printed Matter"), "Bound Printed Matter, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Periodicals"), "Periodicals, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Handling__c ,"Job does not mail"), "Job does not mail",NULL)+''
CustomField.label: Mailing Handling Formatting
